body:
Comment 1: 
SIGINFO is a BSD-ism.  It does not exist on Linux.
It is not in my signal.h (Ubuntu) nor is it in the output of kill -l.

You say that your Linux system does have SIGINFO.
What distribution are you running?
What is the numeric value of SIGINFO?
What does kill -l print?

Russ
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
